name: Kill Sea Monster 3D
description:
Kill Sea Monster 3D is crazy and attacking human by its big punch to survive. This is a sea monster game for the fishing enthusiasts. Sea monster city challenge and explore the underwater shark gun hunter games sea life
Features
Real water physics, cool crocodile movements, and animations
HD 3D Graphics depicting Ocean/Beach Environment.
Intuitive FPS - Real life hunt experience.
Realistic sound effects
Easy and smooth controls to enhance your spear fishing.
Experience Amazing Underwater Hunting Missions
Challenging Sniper Gunner Missions
Attractive 3d graphics for the underwater hunter.
